Name: Versailles
Phrase: No matter how much I search, I can't find any way to get beyond this Hole. Do all the doors and grids here have a gimmick? I can't believe that all our magics and sorceries are repelled...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: You say that and it's already a week since we've started investigating this Hole, okay? No matter how many demons we defeat, the Phantom Mist still occurs and the rain hasn't stopped. There must be a source of Phantom Mist somewhere in this castle.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: The most suspicious place is that big door with all the chains. That's where the generated Mist is the thickest.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: There have been a few instances of Phantom Mist and strange objects appearing in the past, but it's not often that something unusual also happens to the celestial spheres at the same time.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: There is a deep connection between the Mist and the celestial spheres. If railways and Metro Holes are prone to attracting Mist, the celestial sphere is subject to changes due to said Mist.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Ever since that Metro Hole appeared, the situation in Metro has changed a lot. We have decided to cooperate with the Iris Cloud Allied Forces. We have observed many celestial anomalies in each of the Metro countries.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I didn't think we'd be requesting cooperation from the SSS so soon.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: It's embarrassing. Metro matters should be dealt with by us, the Metro Allied Forces. Iris Cloud has their own battles against the Phantom Mist too...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Don't think like that. We will continue to fight with the people of Iris Cloud together.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Together with the people of Iris Cloud...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yes, that's right. We will fight in the Iris Cloud too, Versailles.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Our two realms are connected. There must be a reason for this, and it was necessary to save the world. I don't think only one of the realms will ever be at peace.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Two worlds, protected by the iridescent clouds. Should one of them is engulfed by the Mist, the other will also. The two worlds will be enveloped in ever-darkness, and the Iridescent God will lose her place.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Please stop. This is not a good omen. Where did you learn this?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Let's see... Where was it? Was it in some book?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: More importantly, let's think of a way to do something about this situation. It's all well and good saying that the two of us are going to investigate this castle, but I never thought this would happen...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yes, that's right. It's about time we did something about it.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's been a week since we're stuck in this castle. I guess we can get out if we can clear the Mist, but I can't find anything that looks like the source.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: And we can hardly find any food because we're trapped.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's raining all the time, at least we don't have to worry about water.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: It's still dirty leaked water, you know? How many more days are we going to survive on the little water that falls through the rotten ceiling?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: We're fine, though, aren't we?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I wish I could at least open a window...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I find it strange that a week has gone by and no help has arrived. I wonder if other units are stuck on their way here too.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I think so. Even if they could reach this castle, I don't know if they could get inside... The front door seems to be protected by the most powerful magic in the castle.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: ...and we must not be weak. A siege is more a mental test than physical. We must have a steel will to survive even if it's only water from a leak.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: We're under siege? We're just trapped.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Phantom Mist!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I knew it was coming out through that big door. How many times have this happened so far?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Be careful. The demons we've seen so far are on a different level.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: The Mist is thick and there are many of them. Might be tough to deal with them all in this situation with no escape route...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Get away from the big door at the back as much as possible. Make sure we can see the entire Hole against the entrance.
If you two are behind the door, please move a little further away from it. We will now attempt to force our way through, and should you stay too close to the door, you could be seriously injured.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: This voice is...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Reinforcements! They've come to rescue us!

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I don't know who you are, but thank you for the aid! We're secured here, so please move in!
Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We will now proceed to open the door and move in.
Safety has been secured. We are going in.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Entry successful. We have identified two rescuees.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: You are....

Name: Victoria
Phrase: It's a pleasure to be of your service. I am Victoria. I am Lady Paddington Elrond's personal maid and a Train Knight.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Train Knight?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That means...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Long time no see. Miss Versailles. It hasn't been that long, that said.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino and friends are the SSS. We go out very fast, even in heavy rain.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: The SSS! You've come!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: So sorry for the delay. It's taken us a little while to reorganise the troops.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But we're better prepared than when we were here before. We have the help of the Pawaa-kei, so breaking through kyouko is no problem.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Power... House...?

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Ladies and gentlemen, hush, please do leave the chatter for later. The Mist is thicker than when we entered. Let's destroy the monsters before there are more of them.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes, that's right. We have to be careful because there are more enemies than we expected...

Name: Victoria
Phrase: The quantity is within our expectations. There is nowhere to run for us, but there's nowhere for the other side either. Let us grant them the experience to remember who are the ones that are really being hunted down.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: (Oh... you're the powerhouse.)

Name: Miyako
Phrase: (I'm absolutely sure she's the powerhouse.)

Name: Victoria
Phrase: So, ladies and gentlemen, let's get things underway.
